title: Update biography line-2 text to 'The Doctor of UDesign ©sm'

requirements.summary: Update the Biography component's line-2 text from 'Dr. Shane J Charbonnet' to 'The Doctor of UDesign ©sm' while preserving line-1 and line-3
acceptanceCriteria: The Biography component displays 'The Doctor of UDesign ©sm' on line-2
Line-1 ('Simply Shane Designs ©sm') and Line-3 ('Innovator • Educator • Author') remain unchanged
The text positioning relative to the photo-image is preserved

file_operations.description: Update the text content on line-2 (currently 'Dr. Shane J Charbonnet') to 'The Doctor of UDesign ©sm'. This text appears directly to the right of the photo-image in the context section. Ensure line-1 ('Simply Shane Designs ©sm') and line-3 ('Innovator • Educator • Author') remain unchanged, and preserve the existing layout and positioning relative to the photo-image.
